revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen|Status change}} '''A_BellReset1'''
(''no parameter'')
Begins to undo the properties of death by reestablishing {{Flag|NOGRAVITY}} and multiplying the actor's height by 4. In addition, the actor's special is executed and then unset. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|ZBell}} and derived classes.
